text: From your last battle, your mecenaries has become famous. You may use this chance and establish a mercenary branch in the friendly settlement.\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at the war with the settlement owner[[/col]]

Hrothyogg, Ogre renowned for his mercenary business, has established a mercenary branch in one of your settlements. You will receive Ogre Maneater mercenaries from time to time from now\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at the war with the Hrothyogg[[/col]]
Ogre mercenaries are recruited from Hrothyogg's mercenary branch and now is at your hand for disposal\\n\\n[[col:red]]This branch will be destroyed when you're at the war with the Hrothyogg[[/col]]

Your actions in these dire times have displeased the Khorne. \\n\\n[[col:dark_r]][[img:ui/campaign ui/effect_bundles/effect_bundle_arbaal.png]][[/img]] Your faction has lost huge amount of reputation and will suffer from the consequences[[/col]]
You have collected a toll from tresspassing forces. Lovely

Notorious Ogre Hrothyogg, has collected toll from you\\n\\n[[col:red]]This has happened because you were in the same region with Hrothyogg where he is controlling the settlement while not having allaince or war with him[[/col]]
